title: Midnight Kingdom
description: Revenge is a dangerous game, but I played it for Persephone.Now it's time to pay the price.To win her heart, I have to survive this final battle. And I'll fight for her until my last breath.Midnight Kingdom is the third and last book in the King of Shadows trilogy by USA Today bestselling author Amelia Wilde. King of Shadows and Summer Queen should be read first.
author: Amelia Wilde
